/chats.description: Provides operations to manage the collection of chat entities.

get.description: Retrieve the list of chats that the user is part of. This method supports federation. When a user ID is provided, the calling application must belong to the same tenant that the user belongs to.

/chats/$count.description: Provides operations to count the resources in the collection.

get.summary: Get the number of the resource

/chats/getAllMessages().description: Provides operations to call the getAllMessages method.

/chats/{chat-id}.description: Provides operations to manage the collection of chat entities.

get.description: Retrieve a single chat (without its messages). This method supports federation. To access a chat, at least one chat member must belong to the tenant the request initiated from.

patch.description: Update the properties of a chat object.

/chats/{chat-id}/hideForUser.description: Provides operations to call the hideForUser method.

post.description: Hide a chat for a user.

/chats/{chat-id}/installedApps.description: Provides operations to manage the installedApps property of the microsoft.graph.chat entity.

get.description: List all app installations within a chat.

post.description: Install a teamsApp to the specified chat.

/chats/{chat-id}/installedApps/$count.description: Provides operations to count the resources in the collection.

get.summary: Get the number of the resource

/chats/{chat-id}/installedApps/{teamsApp.description: Provides operations to manage the installedApps property of the microsoft.graph.chat entity.

get.description: A collection of all the apps in the chat. Nullable.

delete.summary: Delete navigation property installedApps for chats

patch.summary: Update the navigation property installedApps in chats

/chats/{chat-id}/installedApps/{teamsApp.description: Provides operations to manage the teamsApp property of the microsoft.graph.teamsAppInstallation entity.

get.description: The app that is installed.

/chats/{chat-id}/installedApps/{teamsApp.description: Provides operations to manage the teamsAppDefinition property of the microsoft.graph.teamsAppInstallation entity.

get.description: The details of this version of the app.

/chats/{chat-id}/installedApps/{teamsApp.description: Provides operations to call the upgrade method.

post.description: Upgrade an app installation within a chat.

/chats/{chat-id}/lastMessagePreview.description: Provides operations to manage the lastMessagePreview property of the microsoft.graph.chat entity.

get.description: Preview of the last message sent in the chat. Null if no messages have been sent in the chat. Currently, only the list chats operation supports this property.

delete.summary: Delete navigation property lastMessagePreview for chats

patch.summary: Update the navigation property lastMessagePreview in chats

/chats/{chat-id}/markChatReadForUser.description: Provides operations to call the markChatReadForUser method.

post.description: Mark a chat as read for a user.

/chats/{chat-id}/markChatUnreadForUser.description: Provides operations to call the markChatUnreadForUser method.

post.description: Mark a chat as unread for a user.

/chats/{chat-id}/members.description: Provides operations to manage the members property of the microsoft.graph.chat entity.

get.description: List all conversation members in a chat. This method supports federation. For one-on-one chats, at least one chat member must belong to the tenant the request initiates from. For group chats, the chat must be initiated by a user in the tenant the request initiates from.

post.description: Add a conversationMember to a chat.

/chats/{chat-id}/members/$count.description: Provides operations to count the resources in the collection.

get.summary: Get the number of the resource

/chats/{chat-id}/members/add.description: Provides operations to call the add method.

post.description: Add multiple members in a single request to a team. The response provides details about which memberships could and couldn't be created.

/chats/{chat-id}/members/{conversationMe.description: Provides operations to manage the members property of the microsoft.graph.chat entity.

get.description: A collection of all the members in the chat. Nullable.

delete.summary: Delete navigation property members for chats

patch.summary: Update the navigation property members in chats

/chats/{chat-id}/messages.description: Provides operations to manage the messages property of the microsoft.graph.chat entity.

get.description: Retrieve the list of messages in a chat. This method supports federation. To list chat messages in application context, the request must be made from the tenant that the channel owner belongs to (represented by the **tenantId** property on the channel).

post.description: Send a new chatMessage in the specified chat. This API can't create a new chat; you must use the list chats method to retrieve the ID of an existing chat before you can create a chat message.

/chats/{chat-id}/messages/$count.description: Provides operations to count the resources in the collection.

get.summary: Get the number of the resource

/chats/{chat-id}/messages/delta().description: Provides operations to call the delta method.

/chats/{chat-id}/messages/{chatMessage-i.description: Provides operations to manage the messages property of the microsoft.graph.chat entity.

get.description: A collection of all the messages in the chat. Nullable.

delete.summary: Delete navigation property messages for chats

patch.summary: Update the navigation property messages in chats

/chats/{chat-id}/messages/{chatMessage-i.description: Provides operations to manage the hostedContents property of the microsoft.graph.chatMessage entity.

get.description: Retrieve the list of chatMessageHostedContent objects from a message. This API only lists the hosted content objects. To get the content bytes, see get chatmessage hosted content

post.summary: Create new navigation property to hostedContents for chats

/chats/{chat-id}/messages/{chatMessage-i.description: Provides operations to count the resources in the collection.

get.summary: Get the number of the resource

/chats/{chat-id}/messages/{chatMessage-i.description: Provides operations to manage the hostedContents property of the microsoft.graph.chatMessage entity.

get.description: Content in a message hosted by Microsoft Teams - for example, images or code snippets.

delete.summary: Delete navigation property hostedContents for chats

patch.summary: Update the navigation property hostedContents in chats

/chats/{chat-id}/messages/{chatMessage-i.description: Provides operations to manage the replies property of the microsoft.graph.chatMessage entity.

get.description: List all the replies to a message in a channel of a team. This method lists only the replies of the specified message, if any. To get the message itself, simply call get channel message.

post.summary: Reply to a message in a channel
post.description: Create a new reply to a chatMessage in a specified channel.

/chats/{chat-id}/messages/{chatMessage-i.description: Provides operations to count the resources in the collection.

get.summary: Get the number of the resource

/chats/{chat-id}/messages/{chatMessage-i.description: Provides operations to call the delta method.
Provides operations to manage the replies property of the microsoft.graph.chatMessage entity.

get.description: Replies for a specified message. Supports $expand for channel messages.

delete.summary: Delete navigation property replies for chats

patch.summary: Update the navigation property replies in chats

/chats/{chat-id}/messages/{chatMessage-i.description: Provides operations to manage the hostedContents property of the microsoft.graph.chatMessage entity.

get.description: Retrieve the list of chatMessageHostedContent objects from a message. This API only lists the hosted content objects. To get the content bytes, see get chatmessage hosted content

post.summary: Create new navigation property to hostedContents for chats

/chats/{chat-id}/messages/{chatMessage-i.description: Provides operations to count the resources in the collection.

get.summary: Get the number of the resource

/chats/{chat-id}/messages/{chatMessage-i.description: Provides operations to manage the hostedContents property of the microsoft.graph.chatMessage entity.

get.description: Content in a message hosted by Microsoft Teams - for example, images or code snippets.

delete.summary: Delete navigation property hostedContents for chats

patch.summary: Update the navigation property hostedContents in chats

/chats/{chat-id}/messages/{chatMessage-i.description: Provides operations to call the softDelete method.
Provides operations to call the undoSoftDelete method.
Provides operations to call the softDelete method.
Provides operations to call the undoSoftDelete method.

/chats/{chat-id}/pinnedMessages.description: Provides operations to manage the pinnedMessages property of the microsoft.graph.chat entity.

get.description: Get a list of pinnedChatMessages in a chat.

post.summary: Pin a message in a chat
post.description: Pin a chat message in the specified chat. This API cannot create a new chat; you must use the list chats method to retrieve the ID of an existing chat before you can pin a chat message.

/chats/{chat-id}/pinnedMessages/$count.description: Provides operations to count the resources in the collection.

get.summary: Get the number of the resource

/chats/{chat-id}/pinnedMessages/{pinnedC.description: Provides operations to manage the pinnedMessages property of the microsoft.graph.chat entity.

get.description: A collection of all the pinned messages in the chat. Nullable.

delete.summary: Delete navigation property pinnedMessages for chats

patch.summary: Update the navigation property pinnedMessages in chats

/chats/{chat-id}/pinnedMessages/{pinnedC.description: Provides operations to manage the message property of the microsoft.graph.pinnedChatMessageInfo entity.

get.description: Represents details about the chat message that is pinned.

/chats/{chat-id}/sendActivityNotificatio.description: Provides operations to call the sendActivityNotification method.

post.description: Send an activity feed notification in scope of a chat. For more details about sending notifications and the requirements for doing so, see sending Teams activity notifications.

/chats/{chat-id}/tabs.description: Provides operations to manage the tabs property of the microsoft.graph.chat entity.

get.description: Retrieve the list of tabs in the specified chat.

post.description:
Add (pin) a tab to the specified chat. 
The corresponding app must already be installed in the chat.

/chats/{chat-id}/tabs/$count.description: Provides operations to count the resources in the collection.

get.summary: Get the number of the resource

/chats/{chat-id}/tabs/{teamsTab-id}.description: Provides operations to manage the tabs property of the microsoft.graph.chat entity.

get.description: A collection of all the tabs in the chat. Nullable.

delete.summary: Delete navigation property tabs for chats

patch.summary: Update the navigation property tabs in chats

/chats/{chat-id}/tabs/{teamsTab-id}/team.description: Provides operations to manage the teamsApp property of the microsoft.graph.teamsTab entity.

get.description: The application that is linked to the tab. This cannot be changed after tab creation.

/chats/{chat-id}/unhideForUser.description: Provides operations to call the unhideForUser method.

post.description: Unhide a chat for a user.
